arts.ttl: Livingston mount comeback to earn draw against 10-player Kilmarnock
arts.sum: George Stanger's second-half red card proved pivotal as 10-man Kilmarnock let a two-goal lead slip to draw 2-2 with newly-promoted Livingston in a dramatic opening match of the new Premiership campaign.

arts.ttl: Kilmarnock vs Livingston predictions: Cagey affair expected at Rugby Park
arts.sum: Kilmarnock and Livingston tend to put on low-scoring affairs when they meet and Joe Casey is expecting more of the same when the pair face off in the first game of the new Scottish Premiership season.

Two sides that are expected to be at the wrong end of the Scottish Premiership table are Kilmarnock, who staved off the drop last year, and newly-promoted Livingston. After a 4th place finish in 2023...
